29500.name: Crown of Bone - Charnel Threshold
29500.description: Bleached ribs arch overhead over a black altar is ringed with teeth. The silence is broken only by distant grinding.

south.description: A stair of ribs descends to the south.

east.description: A corridor of bone runs east.

west.description: A drowned arch yawns west, leading back to the reliquary.

29501.name: Hall of Jawbones
29501.description: Pale bone dust swirls in the air over carved vertebrae form a winding floor. Your breath sounds loud in the ossuary gloom.

south.description: A stair of ribs descends to the south.

east.description: A corridor of bone runs east.

29502.name: The Ossuary Walk
29502.description: A dry cold settles into your skin over skull mosaics stare from every surface. A chill rises from deep in the catacomb.

south.description: A stair of ribs descends to the south.

east.description: A corridor of bone runs east.

29503.name: Ribbed Passage
29503.description: Stacks of skulls line the walls over a bone bridge spans a hollow abyss. Somewhere, a chain scrapes across bone.

south.description: A stair of ribs descends to the south.

east.description: A corridor of bone runs east.

29504.name: The Spine Gallery
29504.description: A faint rattle follows every step over rib cages hang like curtains. The air tastes of dust and old incense.

south.description: A stair of ribs descends to the south.

east.description: A corridor of bone runs east.

29505.name: The Bleached Gate
29505.description: Chiseled femurs form the pillars over the walls are fused with ancient armor. You feel watched by empty sockets.

south.description: A stair of ribs descends to the south.

29506.name: Gravewind Steps
29506.description: Bone lanterns glow with sickly light over a pile of broken shields lies here. The floor vibrates with slow, heavy steps.

north.description: The bone-lined passage leads back north.

south.description: A stair of ribs descends to the south.

east.description: A corridor of bone runs east.

29507.name: The Bone Arcade
29507.description: A bitter scent of grave soil lingers over a cracked sarcophagus gapes open. A low chant echoes through the ribs.

north.description: The bone-lined passage leads back north.

south.description: A stair of ribs descends to the south.

east.description: A corridor of bone runs east.

29508.description: The corridor tightens like a spine over runes are etched into polished bone. The Crown of Bone looms with patient malice.

north.description: The bone-lined passage leads back north.

south.description: A stair of ribs descends to the south.

east.description: A corridor of bone runs east.

29534.name: The Crowned Vault
29534.description: A bitter scent of grave soil lingers over a cracked sarcophagus gapes open. A low chant echoes through the ribs.

north.description: The bone-lined passage leads back north.

east.description: A crown-shaped arch of fused skulls opens to the east.

29535.name: The Throne of Bones
29535.description: The corridor tightens like a spine over runes are etched into polished bone. The Crown of Bone looms with patient malice.

north.description: The bone-lined passage leads back north.

west.description: The skull-arched gate lies west, rattling softly.

east.description: A fractured bonebridge stretches east into a shattered fortress.

29501.name: bone thrall
29501.long_desc: A bone thrall clatters forward, empty sockets staring.
29501.description: Strips of armor and muscle hang from the thrall's pale frame.

29502.name: ossuary archer
29502.long_desc: An ossuary archer nocks a bone-tipped arrow.
29502.description: This skeletal marksman is bound in lacquered bone plates.

29503.name: marrow priest
29503.long_desc: A marrow priest raises a staff of fused vertebrae.
29503.description: Its robes are stitched from funerary wrappings and bone dust.

29504.name: gravebound juggernaut
29504.long_desc: A gravebound juggernaut lumbers here, bones grinding.
29504.description: A hulking mass of fused skeletons, it wields a pillar of femurs.

29505.name: spine reaver
29505.long_desc: A spine reaver skitters across the bone tiles.
29505.description: Its bladed limbs are built from sharpened ribs and teeth.

29506.name: sepulcher wraith
29506.long_desc: A sepulcher wraith drifts through the ossuary, whispering.
29506.description: A tattered spirit bound to bone, it chills everything it passes.

29507.name: ribcage sentinel
29507.long_desc: A ribcage sentinel stands watch, jaws clacking.
29507.description: A hollow guardian of bone plate, its core filled with cold blue fire.

29510.name: charnel choir vicar
29510.long_desc: The Charnel Choir Vicar sings, each note cutting like a blade.
29510.description: Its voice is layered with a hundred dead throats, bound to a single will.

29511.name: ossuary harvester
29511.long_desc: The Ossuary Harvester hefts a cleaver of bone.
29511.description: A massive collector of bones, it moves with deliberate, brutal purpose.

29520.name: bone-crowned sovereign
29520.long_desc: The Bone-Crowned Sovereign rises from its throne, regalia clattering.
29520.description: A monarch draped in bone-laced armor, its crown a lattice of skulls.

29550.name: Gravewind Greatsword
29550.room_desc: A massive greatsword of bone and iron lies here.

29551.name: Ossuary Bulwark
29551.room_desc: A shield of interlocked femurs rests here.

29552.name: Skullcaller Wand
29552.room_desc: A wand carved from a finger bone rests here.

29553.name: Rattlebind Longbow
29553.room_desc: A longbow strung with sinew hangs here.

29554.name: Marrowcarver Stiletto
29554.room_desc: A stiletto of polished bone lies here, razor sharp.

29555.name: Cadaverous Lute
29555.room_desc: A lute strung with sinew rests here, silent.

29556.name: Boneweft Cowl
29556.room_desc: A hood stitched with bone shards lies here.

29557.name: Gravebinder Mail
29557.room_desc: A suit of mail of etched bone rests here.

29558.name: Crown of the Ossuary
29558.room_desc: A crown of fused skulls lies here, whispering softly.

29559.name: Sovereign's Boneblade
29559.room_desc: A blade carved from a giant's femur lies here.
